description: React component implementing a device management UI with CRUD operations, status polling, filtering, sorting, and theme toggling.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches the list of devices and updates the state.

methods.name: startAdd
methods.description: Prepares the UI for adding a new device.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Prepares the UI for editing an existing device.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission for creating or updating a device.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a device after user confirmation.

methods.name: onPing
methods.description: Triggers a status check for a device.
